SYN_2_1_9137:
Indication: Malignant CAO, Embedded stent.
Procedure: Rigid bronchoscopy, Stent removal, Tumor debulking, Y-stent.
Findings: RMS 70% obstruction (tumor). LMS 75% obstruction + embedded stent. TBM mid-trachea.
Actions:
- Diagnostic flex bronch.
- Rigid bronch inserted.
- LMS: APC/debulking/balloon dilation. Metallic stent removed piecemeal.
- RMS: APC debulking.
- Customized Y-stent placed (hole cut for RUL).
Plan: Radiation oncology consult. Removal in 2 weeks.
